# Sapphire Screen of Shielding (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]] \[[[Force Spells|force]]] 

**Level:** [[5th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 5]], [[5th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 5]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 9th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 9]]

**Components:** V, S, F (a sapphire worth at least 250 gp)

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level (D)

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Lost Empires of Faerun (Wotc), pg. 33

You create a levitating, square screen of fluid blue force approximately 5 feet on a side and 1 inch thick. This screen responds immediately to spells and physical attacks that target you, moving with you and flowing freely around your body to protect you from specific attacks.

In addition to providing the effect of a *[[Shield (Spell)|shield]]* spell, *sapphire screen of shielding* also gives you damage reduction 10/magic.

**GM Note**

*House Rule:* This spell is known as *Nezram's sapphire screen of shielding* in the Forgotten Realms.
